_header: Afore meat and after gracias say we
_description: Grace before and after meat — one stanza rhyme royal

BodRawB408.First Lines:
Affore mete and aftir gracias say weThankyng þe lord of al
                    þi grete grace …
BodRawB408.Last Lines:
…Thyne almes [.]s redy to riche and poreEuer blessid þou
                    be good lorde þerfore
BodRawB408.Editions:
Clark,  Andrew,
                        ed.  
             The English Register of Godstow Nunnery… c. 1450.
             3 vols. 
             EETS
         o. s. 129 (1905; repr. 1971); 130 (1906; repr. with 142, 1971); 142
            (1911; repr. 1971): 1.12.
